topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b6c86e6368726529e50500#post_54b6c86e6368726529e50500
*Fandom on Sunset Shimmer*

>Fandom Opinions on Sunset pre-Rainbow Rocks: *ECH SHE SUCKS. But she's got some really good fanart of her!*
>Sunset fans pre-Rainbow Rocks: *We like Sunset! Don't flame us!*
>Fandom Opinions on Suset post-Rainbow Rocks: *OMG SHE'S BEST PONY/BEST HUMAN NOW WE LOVE YOU SUNSET!*
>Sunset-fans pre-Rainbow Rocks: *Eh, we like her before she was cool. But we're glad you respect our opinions now. Let's celebrate!*

Let's face it, the above is true.
I mean, holy crap, how did she become one the fandom's most hated of character to one of its most beloved? I'll admit I thought she had potential, but now I'm glad that potential's being explored more.
